fullDescription.intro: Computes various properties for polygons. The first table must contain the polygons. The second table must contains the coordinates, which are referenced by the polygons via Row ID.
fullDescription.option: Column with polygons from the first input table.
Column with latitudes from the second input table.
Column with longitudes from the second input table.

ports.inPort: Polygons. Reference the coordinates in the second table.
